sub-events.comment: 3 Waves Phases = 8 for the first, 9 for the second, 10 for the third, 11 when third wave is down

event-group.title: Phase 18 = Joining Shadow and Lover Room
Phase 18 = The Shadow and The Lover

action.name: Call function
action.param: 650{###}1600{###}"...Prima che tu la portassi via da me."

action.name: Set text
action.param: "Ombra: ...Prima che tu la portassi via da me."

action.name: Set text
action.param: "P.: Mi farai uscire di senno!"&newline&"Mi manderai al manicomio"&newline&"Caricatore + 1"

action.name: Set text
action.param: "P.: Tu sarai sempre con me."&newline&"Una catena ci lega"&newline&"Vigore +1"

action.name: Set text
action.param: "P.: Il tuo cuore"&newline&"appartiene solo a me!"&newline&"Onda d'urto"
